snippet.title: Sonic Rivals Dash (Flash Game)
snippet.description:
This little sidescrolling racing game was made available on the Official North American Sonic Rivals website back in 2007, but that site is now gone, as was the game. 

I went into the Web Archive in hopes of finding them complete as most of the ones I've found lacked music, or didn't play at all!

Download: https://mega.nz/#!C8hBHC4Y!SxBQwHKsDxsKKp6mcqvk9BcPT_tlLBwWOydlQl0Q3Rw

How to Play:
Launch with - pjinns_sonic_rivals.swf

Open with your preferred Browser of choice, and click that check box, so it will always launch there.

Games have been tested Offline and do work, but a browser is still necessary to play!

_______________________Links_____________________
Twitter - https://www.twitter.com/Darkspines147
